data.title: Felipe Esparza #27 by Buddies!
data.meta_description:
This was a really fun one to record. The boys sit down with Felipe Esparza! a very very funny comedian and a favorite of Franks Mother. They boys start off with bong rips and dabs to the face, the boys talk Vietnam, Tagging Sadam's Chair, The Comedy Store and Felipe tells us about the new season of the Eric Andre Show! Check out Felipes Netflix specials he shot 2! one in English and one in Spanish! " BAD DECISIONS"  
15 gram cannon. 14 grams of double blue dream by humboldts finest and 1 gram of cured gelato33 resin processed by friendly farms.  
Kush Mints by Ember Valley  
Bubba Kush x Animal Mints 
Tasting notes: earthy with a cookies funk, just a kiss of mint on the end.   
A special thanks to Friendly Farms for the dabs  
guava x gelato cured resin planet dosi cured resin
data.text:
Pack that bowl and sit back because Franks about to get roasted. The boys sit down with Writer, Comedian, Paid Regular, Jerron Horton. Jerron has written on all the dope Tv show, the Roasts and a murder onstage. He is also one of franks oldest friends, they have shared countless memories working at the comedy store and going on the road, and he was in franks wedding! JP met Jerron through the comedy store and the countless smoke sessions in sacred ground where Jerron is arguably the most consistent killer in the smoke circle. This episode is no different, We talk Franks wedding, The PS5, and The High Rise Decor!

LIKE AND SUBSCRIBE! ITUNES SPOTIFY ANCHORFM

JOIN THE PATREON! https://www.patreon.com/BuddiesPodcast?fan_landing=true

THANK YOU @highrisetv @basecamp.beverylhills

SPONSORS: Weed: @Sherbinsky

Concentrates/Vapes @friendlyfarmsca @teamfriendly

subscribe to get episodes early! and also get a big joint with your name on it!

Social Media! IG:@buddies.podcast Frank Castillo Twitter: @frankccomedy IG: @frankcastillo JP IG: @JP_Noda

That New New for you to roll up and listen too! Today the boys have two legends in the Weed industry, Bobby McGowan & Justin Capri, Co Founders of Cannacraft. They are killing the game, they have multiple lines on the market, Hifi Hops, ABX Vapes, Concentrates, Care By Design and now their new flower line The Farmer and The Felon. A fantastic flower line that also partnered up with The Last Prisoner Project a group fighting to help reform Cannabis Laws and get people out of jail for weed related crimes. Frank and the guys go back to when he was just a door guy that would sneak into the back of Sam Tripoli's Comedy Chaos shows to do dabs with the guys, Jp knows them through working at Buds and Roses and the comedy store, so this episode we really have a lot of fun.

This episode we talk BJJ, Moving to texas, The Comedy Store highs, and the future of the industry.

LIKE AND SUBSCRIBE! ITUNES SPOTIFY ANCHORFM JOIN THE PATREON!

SMOKE:

Wedding Pie by Ember Valley - Wedding Cake x Grape Pie.

Tasting notes: sweet grape and gasoline

Another hot episode for you to pack in your bowl and smoke. This week we have Jarobi White & Chris Riggins. They both stop by to tell the boys about the new project they are working on called "Dope Dinners", A intimate show mixing, comedy music and weed! Jarobi is not only an amazing musician, but a phenomenal chef, Chris is one of franks friends and amazing comic from the Bay Area.

JP rolls us some fire and we celebrate the shows first sponsor! Friendly Farms! This episode we cover, Internet porn, Chappelles Summer Camp, and Chris's Fathers Nipples.

LIKE AND SUBSCRIBE! ITUNES SPOTIFY ANCHORFM JOIN THE PATREON! https://www.patreon.com/BuddiesPodcast?fan_landing=true THANK YOU @highrisetv @basecamp.beverylhills

SMOKE: Jack Herer -By simply cannabis

Terps: pine trees and fresh lemon Kush mints - by flora cal Bubba Kush x Animal Mints

Tasting notes: earthy with a cookies funk, just a kiss of mint on the end.

Rolls Choice - by farmer and the Felon Chem dog x og kush Terps: og kush gas all day. A little chem on the end.

BlueberryDiesel by - humboldts finest Blueberry x NYSour Diesel

Terps: sweet stone fruit with a slight diesel gasoline finish

This episode it out of this world, the boys sit down with THE MASTER ARTIST, THE ART GOD HIMSELF, Jason Lee. The boys met The Master Artist at HighRiseTv's BASECAMP, instantly hit it off. He showed them his wild art and told them his wild origin story, so we had to have him on the podcast. Starting off in Commercial advertising, one of his first accounts was working on the new Microsoft Project that would become the XBOX 360. He designed a skin that you could buy for your xbox avatar, which is how most of these major AAA game studios now make all their money off of, Skins. After his design made 1 Milliion dollars for Microsoft he decided it was time to go on his own and become a "Fine artist". its an amazing story and Jp absolutely breaks Frank with dabs.

The Master Artist - Jason Lee @jasonleearts

SMOKE: The Master Artist Sin Mint Cookies by Pearl Pharma - GSC x Blue Power

Tasting notes: Classic GSC taste with a hint of mint

Silver Cloud by A Golden State - A proprietary genetic, reminiscent of a Gelato is usually a cross of Sunset sherbet x Thin Mint Cookies Sweet sherbet (strain) and potent diesel gas finish

Grape Pie @pffn.co - Cherry Pie x Grape Stomper Terps: Freshly made grape jelly

This week JP and Frank sit down with two very funny friends and comedians, Sara Weinshenk and Rachel Wolfson! Frank has know these two for a very long time, Frank and Sara came up together at the Store when they first moved to LA. Frank met Wolfie a few years ago when she started stand up, she has quickly made a name for herself in comedy and the weed industry.

JP has smoked in the back with both of them countless times and followed their journeys through podcasts. But today we get super baked and talk about, being fat kids growing up, worst bombs, being drunk at the comedy store, and stalking childhood crushes!

LIKE AND SUBSCRIBE! ITUNES SPOTIFY ANCHORFM

Smoke for the episode!

Wedding Pie by Ember Valley - Wedding Cake x Grape Pie.

Tasting notes: sweet grape and gasoline

Space Cake by pffn - snow lotus x platinum cookies

Tasting notes: og kush gas with a light cookies funk

Space Cake x Wedding Pie x MAC1 Hash by Calihash

This was a really fun one to record. The boys sit down with Felipe Esparza! a very very funny comedian and a favorite of Franks Mother. They boys start off with bong rips and dabs to the face, the boys talk Vietnam, Tagging Sadam's Chair, The Comedy Store and Felipe tells us about the new season of the Eric Andre Show! Check out Felipes Netflix specials he shot 2! one in English and one in Spanish! " BAD DECISIONS"

15 gram cannon. 14 grams of double blue dream by humboldts finest and 1 gram of cured gelato33 resin processed by friendly farms.

Kush Mints by Ember Valley

Bubba Kush x Animal Mints

Tasting notes: earthy with a cookies funk, just a kiss of mint on the end.

A special thanks to Friendly Farms for the dabs

guava x gelato cured resin planet dosi cured resin

The boys sit down HighRiseTV! JP met Erin and Derek through Josh, who we met at an Industry Christmas party with Ryan from Focus Concentrates. This episode was a great, HighRiseTv is an weed advertising agency that helps develope weed brands. HighRiseTV was nice enough to let us shoot at their dope Content Mansion in Beverly Hills. The Boys had an eye opening talk about the weed industry, we smoked a lot of weed and bro'ed down hard. Erin & Derek are so down to earth, we talk skateboarding, chads, comedy and Derek tells us a story about traveling to Europe with his Skate Team.

11 grams of assorted OG Kush flower. 1 gram banana og Hash from @biscottiofficial and .5 grams of chocolate covered strawberries from @focus.findyours

Space Cake @pffn.co - Girl Scout Cookies x Snow Lotus

Terps: Funk from the GSC with sweet a floral finish

Grape Pie @pffn.co - Cherry Pie x Grape Stomper

Terps: Freshly made grape jelly

Pink Picasso @wonderbrett - Candy Land x OZK

Terps: smells like fruity pebble rice krispees

The boys sit down with Eric D & Rebecca Undead of Meth Syndicate, Jp and I are big fans, but JP is a diehard fan. Every episode we shoot JP wears a Meth Syndicate shirt, and I don't blame him they make dope AF shirts. All of them are limited drops and the designs are fucking amazing. We get these two extremely stoned, we talk hanging at The Comedy Store, Our favorite bartenders and a waving Val Kilmer.

Please Rate and Subscribe! follow us! iTunes! Spotify! Anchor.fm!

Instagrams!

@buddies.podcast @frankcastillo @JP_Noda

Guests: @methsyndicate @rebeccaundead

Smoke: Runtz bowls.

Runtz gifted to us by by our buddie @nicksapienza1

Famously believed to be gelato x Zkittlez

Tasting notes: ripe pine trees and Zkittlez candy

A fat joint of wedding cake from @freskbaked gifted to us by the homies up at @highrisetv

Triangle Kush x animal mints

Tasting notes: diesel gasoline and a strong kush aroma

Frank and I dabbed on some GMO Rosin @rosintechlabs

Chem D x GSC Tasting notes: roasted garlic with a pungent chem aftertaste

Last joint Midnight snacks by @mavengenetics Dosido x Dark Helmet

Tasting notes: sweat earthy with a slight floral funkiness

The Buddies sit down with Comedian Alice Hamilton! an extremely funny and talked comic frank met on the LA comedy scene. Frank watch Alice grow as a comic and only become funnier and funnier, her back ground is very unique. She sits down with JP and I and we discuss growing up in a super conservative family, missing out on Harry Potter, and the horrors of LA open mics. JP Rolls here a fat joint and she smokes a whole 8th to herself!

SMOKE:

Nepalm Grenade - from Napalm. The strain was Gunpowder 7grams of flower and one gram of live resin rolled in an THC infused paper

Kush mints - by flora cal

Bubba Kush x Animal Mints

Tasting notes: earthy with a cookies funk, just a kiss of mint on the end.

Alice smoked a whole ass eighth to herself.

The boys sit down with two regulars of the sacred ground circle and celebrate 710! Paid Regular Mat Edgar and the hilarious Wolfie, Frank met Mat Edgar at The Comedy Store, they bonded over their love of Taking Back Sunday. Frank met Wolfie through comedy and their love of weed! JP knows Wolfie through the industry and comedy. Wolfie and Mat are both dating and its a beautiful think when two very funny people get together. This episode we have an absolute blast. Mat and Frank talk about movies and how adoption videos on YouTube make them cry, and Wolfie talks about how we all loved dane cook at some point. Smoke: JP's Picks! 3.5g Juice Z by atrium + 1g blueberry muffin hash from frenchy cannoli Juice Z is a cross of Juicy Gummy x Zkittlez Tasting notes : over ripe citrus and berry candy Wedding Pie by @ember_valley - Wedding Cake x Grape Pie. Tasting notes: sweet grape and gasoline Cocoa dulce by 3C Farms Illuminati OGx Northern Lights Tasting notes: Earthy and Piney
